visual_style_summary: A dark, ultra-premium studio setting with a deep black velvet background. High-contrast warm golden rim lighting highlights the polished gold surface and sparkling diamonds. Sharp, realistic reflections and subtle sparkle highlights emphasize the ring's luxury and craftsmanship. Cinematic depth and refined textures create a sophisticated, timeless mood with a focus on clarity, brilliance, and elegant detailing.

scenes.description: Extreme macro close-up of the central round-cut diamond, showcasing facets, clarity, and sparkle within 2 seconds.
scenes.camera_movement: static shot with subtle focus pull
scenes.lighting_setup: soft spotlight from above with warm golden rim light, high-contrast reflections on the diamond

scenes.description: Gradual and smooth 360-degree rotation of the ring over a glossy reflective surface from 2 to 8 seconds, emphasizing the detailed craftsmanship and interaction of light with facets and gold.
scenes.camera_movement: slow, continuous orbit at fixed height
scenes.lighting_setup: consistent high-contrast studio lighting with golden rim light and subtle light flare effects during orbit

scenes.description: Slight zoom out to showcase the full elegance of the ring, with emphasis on craftsmanship and reflective highlights, concluding with a cinematic shadowed soft focus to reinforce luxury.
scenes.lighting_setup: consistent studio lighting, gentle shadowing, soft focus for a cinematic finish

technical_notes: Maintain strict product consistency throughout all scenes; the jewellery must stay exactly identical in shape, size, and positioning. Use macro lenses (100mm, f/2.8) for detailed shots. The lighting should produce high-contrast sparkle highlights and realistic reflections without overexposure. Reflections must be physically accurate, avoiding any exaggerated or artificial effects. Depth of field should be soft enough to isolate the product, with sharp focus on key features during each scene.
